text: Hi Jaidev, Nice to meet you. My name is Marc Brewster and I look forward to helping you where I can!!
Please tell me a bit about yourself with some background so I can see where you are coming from and then we can see where I can help and perhaps give some guidance. SOund good?

I currently go to villiers sixth form. I do mathematics, computer science and history currently and am hoping to do further maths too. I absolutely love maths but i also love coding. I've learnt visual basics(<http://vb.net|vb.net>) and python. I know a bit about java but not really practised it as of yet. In 2 years time, I hope to get into university to study computer science (still not sure whether i want do do mathematics and computer science as a joint course). Currently, I am working on a python project to then later put on the play store.
Hi Jaidev, I kind of understand where you are now.
May I ask how you heard about the VFX industry? And did you have any idea of what you might like to do within the industry?
